p: The PubMed and EMBASE databases were searched for key words such as ‘Mendelian randomization’, ‘neuro*’, ‘Parkinson*’, ‘Alzheimer*’, ‘dementia’, ‘Huntington*’ and ‘multiple sclerosis’ to identify MR studies published before 23 July 2019, with no language restrictions. Further articles were located through the references of these articles. Studies were assessed for relevance based on titles, abstracts and full texts.
